name: Persona Free Template
description:
#####################


Hey folks, please help my country(#Ukraine) in any way you can find on the media or internet with Russian invasion. Too many civilians died from Russian missiles. Innocent people. That needs to be stopped.


#####################


During my day to day work i came up with an idea of persona template for Figma community.


Persona in UX design process actually used to frame all of ideas and needs around the individual that is most likely to use future product. It's capturing the basic details about the person you are designing for and build a deeper understanding of their personality, wants and needs.


Hope you will find it useful. Customize, edit, change it and have fun!
